turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello there, how can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I need to order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: order pizza from Bella Luna, ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Need to get three small pizzas. Need to get one Italian sausage pizza, one meat lover's pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And then I needed to also get one deep dish pepperoni pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And then on the other two pizzas, they need to just be regular thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, 3 small pizzas, 1 with regular thick crust italian sausage, 1 regular thick crus meat lover, and 1 deep dish pepperoni, is that what you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it with 3 small pizzas your total comes to 40 dollars.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: shall we go ahead and order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wonderful. Nope, that's it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are welcome, enjoy your pizza.
